snippet: Airbus Group's recent name change is enhancing how the European weapons and planemaker is perceived, particularly among U.S. government customers, a company executive said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Name Change Lifts Airbus' Image in Washington: Airbus U.S. Chief
headline.main: Name Change Lifts Airbus' Image in Washington: Airbus U.S. Chief

lead_paragraph: Airbus Group's recent name change is enhancing how the European weapons and planemaker is perceived, particularly among U.S. government customers, a company executive said on Tuesday.
